record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 6049
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 6049 -- (Senate - June 04, 2008)

[Page: S5120]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 6049 has been received from the House and is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

A bill (H.R. 6049) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide incentives for energy production and conservation, to extend certain expiring provisions, to provide individual income tax relief, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for its second reading and I object to my own request.
